tool_description: This simple API returns  radom fun facts
name: Fun Facts
title: Fun Facts

api_list.name: fun-fact
api_list.description: returns radomly generated facts on each all
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fun-facts1.p.rapidapi.com/api/fun-facts"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fun-facts1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://fun-facts1.p.rapidapi.com/api/fun-facts"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fun-facts1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
